title: Workshop on Applying Educational Technology Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital device usage (computer/tablet)
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course incorporating gamification elements to enhance educational motivation for adult learners

learning_goals: The core principles of gamification (experience points, missions, rewards) can be applied to real educational scenarios
Activities can be designed using digital quiz platforms to improve learner engagement by over 30%
A system can be established to monitor learner progress at over 80% using class management tools (e.g., ClassDojo)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
